item.title: Parsing A WebAssembly Binary With Kaitai Struct
item.description: Traditionally Java libraries come with everything but the kitchen sink. In the past, people have given a lot of crap to the JavaScript ecosystem, but if there is something I envy, is how tiny some libraries are. People are still joking about left-pad to this day; in reality, the JavaScript ecosystem has come a long way ever since, and I believe we have all something to learn. Long story short, I was looking for a Java library to parse WebAssembly binaries, and what I found was either a full-blown interpreter or something outdated.
